alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 3:44PM CST until December 15 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR WESTERN WOODBURY...SOUTHWESTERN PLYMOUTH...DAKOTA...DIXON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES... At 343 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wayne to near Pender to near Uehling, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Allen around 355 PM CST. Homer and Martinsburg around 400 PM CST. Sioux City metro and Salix around 405 PM CST. Elk Point, Jefferson and Ponca State Park around 410 PM CST. Lawton around 415 PM CST. Moville and Hornick around 420 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bronson and Waterbury. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northwestern and west central Iowa...northeastern Nebraska...and southeastern South Dakota.
